dict.acceptation: 失败，不及格；缺乏，不足；破产，倒闭；失败的事，失败者；

sent.orig: American manufacturers to failure as a failure and are doing their best to avoid such failure.
sent.trans: 美国厂商把出现故障看作是失败，并尽力避免这种失败。

sent.orig: They are mainly corrosion failure, explosion-failure and environmental fracture failure, etc.
sent.trans: 在众多机理中，主要是腐蚀失效、爆炸失效及环境断裂失效等。

sent.orig: Random wedge failure is one of the common failure types of rock slope excavation.
sent.trans: 随机楔体的破坏是岩石开挖边坡中常见的破坏类型之一。

sent.orig: I'm grateful for failure, while others curse at their failure.
sent.trans: 别人为失败而诅咒，而我为失败而感激！

sent.orig: Failure comes to those who indifferently allow themselves to become FAILURE CONSCIOUS.
sent.trans: 失败则降临在满不在乎、任由自己自觉会失败的人的身上。
